description: Variation of Condition Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission ref: 19/01076/FUL (Erection of single storey building for use as a management suite and reception. Internal and external alterations to existing buildings to facilitate refurbishment of existing student accommodation, including installation of PV panels, with associated parking and landscaping arrangements). Variation sought to  reduce number of cycle parking stores due to conflict with TPO tree
